subject: World Figure Skating Championships
Figure Skating
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: While international skating officials consider whether to cancel next week’s world figure skating championships in Tokyo because of the nuclear crisis, Germany said it would not send its team.
snippet: While international skating officials consider whether to cancel next week’s world figure skating championships in Tokyo because of the nuclear crisis, Germany said it would not send its team.
